package.name: StatusBarGesture
package.shortDescription: Gestures on status bar on iOS 13 (since Activator is not working properly ¯\_(ツ)_/¯). It'll execute any command you input into the field.

descriptionlist.description: Gestures on status bar on iOS 13 (since Activator is not working properly ¯\_(ツ)_/¯). It'll execute any command you input into the field.
